title: I Wanna Hold You
lyrics: Tell me that you want me baby Tell me that it's true Say the magic words and I'd des troy the world for you An army for the broken hearted Marching through the streets and everything is burning to the ground under your feet I wanna hold you My skies are turning black Feels like a heart attack And I'd do any thing you as I wanna hold you bad Atten tion plea se, We interrupt this program With some disturbing news A worldwide evacuation We're GOING TO LOSE And they've pulverised the nation I guess it shows us just what love can do I'd do anything you ask I wanna hold you bad
